title: Funeral is the realest hashtag on Instagram
text:
#Funeral is the realest hashtag on Instagram 
Daily Dot Sunday 25th October, 2015 
Instagram ?in particular?is a branded purgatory, with a smattering of your friends' FOMO-bait photos amid accounts you followed and don't care enough to unfollow.?But when you search beyond that, there's a warm, human side to Instagram--perhaps the best archive we've got of the human experience in 2015.Hashtags provide an actual function, and are a basic Internet thing I mostly forget about and never use. Luckily, a lot of folks do, and what's resulted is an accidentally beautiful, endless grid of the more candid, genuine side of society. We'll seek to explore these unappreciated nooks and cra...
